page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: The only educational establishment in the block is St.Michael & All Angels CofE School,Foulridge.It is a mixed junior and infant school with 170 pupils.The teaching staff are led by Mrs K.Allen,Headteacher.There are 6 other teaching staff. The school moved into its present building 6 years ago when it was vacated by an R.C. convent school for girls,which was built in 1954.At present the junior classes occupy 4 upstairs rooms & the infants the 2 downstairs rooms.Being a comparatively large building for a primary school,it has 2 dining rooms,a small kitchen,a large hall for assemblies,sports & socials,a large staffroom & a school library founded by the Bishop of Blackburn.There is also a large playing field & a playground attached to the school.
